resources.string: The Find application, native to the iPhone, started to find cell phones even when they are not connected to the Internet. A new version, announced by Apple at the WWDC 2019 congress, was developed to unify Find My iPhone and Find My Friends services in a single application - now called Find / Find. The system has the help of Bluetooth to ensure greater efficiency and security. So when the iPhone is turned on or plugged in again, how the changes will take effect.
